https://code.google.com/p/go/

LGTM
i love seeing keywords from other languages appear as variable names

Submitted so I can check in a compiler bug fix
with a test that uses this.  Brad, if you have comments
I'll be happy to apply them tomorrow.

subject: code review 5753068: test: invoke go command in run.go
